system.description:
When you rage, you seethe with elemental energies, and woe betide those who would challenge you. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half your berserker levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of what Elemental Defense options you have access to.
  • When you rage, choose a damage type your Elemental Blast can deal. While you are raging, you emit an aura of elemental energy around yourself. Creatures that enter or begin their turns within 5 feet of you must make a Constitution save against your spell save DC or take 2d6 points of the chosen damage type, or half as much on a successful save.
  • While you are raging, your berserker levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of determining how much damage your Elemental Blast does.
